oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Robert K. Morrison describing action around Florence, AL
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Morrison is in the same unit, Co. A of the 38th Tenn. Inf., as his brothers David Zeno and James. He refers to his [Cheatham's] division, which "has been a very hard time and has lost very heavy in battle this year." Letter is transcribed.
